value.string:
configuration_save = context.restrictedTraverse(configuration_save_url)
 group_id = context.getGlobalConfigurationAttr('group_id')
 
 # setup Rules
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Rule Configurator Item")
 
 # setup default security
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Role Configurator Item", 
 filename="portal_types_roles_standard.ods",
 group_id = 'group/%s' %group_id)
 
 # web site module security
 # we will not provide web_site_module for now.
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Permission Configurator Item",
 filename="module_permission_access.ods")
 
 # Catalog Keyword Search Keys are for now hardcoded.
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Catalog Keyword Key Configurator Item",
 key_list=('description', 'title', 'catalog.description', 'catalog.title'))
 
 # This could be a customer decision option
 # configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Site Property Configurator Item",
 # site_property_list=[[['email_from_address', 'email@example.com', 'string'],]])
 
 # Customize portal type information.
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Purchase Order',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrder',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Sale Order',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrder',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Purchase Order Line',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrderLine',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Sale Order Line',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrderLine',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Inventory',
 add_propertysheet_list=('InventoryConstraint',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Sale Packing List',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrder',))
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Portal Type Configurator Item",
 target_portal_type='Sale Packing List Line',
 add_propertysheet_list=('TradeOrderLine',))
 
 # These must be last
 configuration_save.addConfigurationItem("Export Customer BT5 Configurator Item")
